entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Umiujaq
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:29 AM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow and Blowing Snow, -12.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Umiujaq Airport 12:00 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow and Blowing Snow
Temperature: -12.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.2 kPa rising
Visibility: 0.2 km
Humidity: 84 %
Wind Chill: -24
Dewpoint: -14.5°C
Wind: SSW 40 km/h gust 50 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Blizzard. Temperature steady near minus 11.
